description: Running Man Shorts are lightweight running shorts that give you great freedom of movement and a relaxed fit. The shorts are made from a breathable, thermo-regulating material in a blend of Merino wool (58%), polyamide and elastane, to increase durability and elasticity. Merino wool is naturally resistant to bacteria, and thereby odours - and the shorts will require less washing than comparable training wear. Merino wool also feels warmer when you run in cooler temperatures.
name: Devold Running Shorts - Mens
